mapper.insert: insert into shopping_cart(u_id, param_id, c_number) values (#{obj.uId}, #{obj.paramId}, #{obj.cNumber})
mapper.select: SELECT p_name, param_image, c_number, price, c_id, color, memory_size, pm.p_id pid FROM prod_details pd INNER JOIN parameter pm ON pd.p_id = pm.p_id INNER JOIN shopping_cart s ON s.param_id = pm.param_id WHERE s.u_id = #{uId}
select (c_number * price) price from shopping_cart s inner join parameter p on s.param_id = p.param_id where c_id = #{obj.cId}

SELECT p_name, param_image, c_number, price, c_id, color, memory_size, pm.p_id pid, pm.param_id FROM prod_details pd INNER JOIN parameter pm ON pd.p_id = pm.p_id INNER JOIN shopping_cart s ON s.param_id = pm.param_id WHERE s.c_id = #{cId}
